lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: The centre i use to train children and villagers is running out of resources, so i need more computers,chairs and equipments to familiarize them with modern technology.
lender.occupational_info: I an an individual who helps the people in the village of Ikiliwindi around Kumba Municipality. I offer cheap rate computer programs on Microsft Hardware and software and i also run cyber cafe in the same place. So, through this centre, i train the less priviledged, children and the laity. Now, i have just 4 computers that i was using and now i have more than enough people to train. So, i need to buy more computers and also increase my bandwith for the internet and also buy more equipments to meet with the modern technology.

lender.name: Bunny
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Jes√∫s Roque

lender.name: Marketing Divas

lender.occupational_info: "If you choose not to decide you still have made a choice" -- Rush (Free Will)

lender.occupational_info: trading interest rates with banks/governments or investment manager.

lender.loan_because: Our daughter gave us a gift certificate and that got us started. We think it is a very worthwhile cause.

lender.occupational_info: I work with horses. My horses jump over fences.I am also starting up a family business where I trust it will prove to be successful.

lender.name: Richard

lender.occupational_info: I provide strategic planning and management education and consulting services to nonprofit and for profit organizations across the United States.

lender.name: Lakeridge H.S.
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. As global citizens, we must all do what we can to improve our world.
lender.occupational_info: We are the Model United Nations club at Lakeridge High School.

lender.name: vanessa
lender.loan_because: As a single parent it was often the humanity people shared that gave me the opportunity to raise my children to be the responsible /caring adults they are today. Through the continued expressions of caring and kindness people have shown I have also been afforded the opportunity / privilege to obtain my formal higher education. "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world. Indeed it's the only thing that ever has. " Margaret Mead

lender.name: Jamey
lender.loan_because: Do all you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can. -John Wesley
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hospital.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Violaannesusan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and we feel a deep love for these people in need.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want my kids to see how they can be of assistance to others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with community banks in the US.

lender.name: Red Lake Ambulance
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: We drive an ambulance and provide emergency medical care to people in need.

lender.name: Paul and Kay
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. The west is so rich, a loan of any amount will change a life. WWJD?, I think we all know the answer to that one.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a small electrical business, with 20 employes.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to help someone.

lender.name: Joyce Anne
lender.loan_because: I know from personal experience how a small amount of help can make a really big difference in one's life. Giving enriches my life as much as theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I was always in a creative environment and even though I am retired, I still keep involved in community.

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. My Uncle Chris gave me a gift certificate on Kiva. I'm really happy to help different people who need money.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Grade Three.

lender.name: rohan
lender.loan_because: Its these small steps that we all take together that can make a big change in the world we know

lender.name: Yesenia
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: truk
lender.loan_because: I've seen the impact that small, targeted loans can have in communities around the world. These loans, when done in a responsible way, maximize the positive impact an individual from a relatively wealthy country can have on the lives of others living in a developing economy.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain computer systems, particularly the software used to operationally run enterprises. I enjoy traveling, particularly outside the United States.

lender.name: Malaker Family
lender.loan_because: Our loans improve lives in developing nations, and we feel good about it.

lender.name: Viernanda Yoga
lender.loan_because: I need the fund to establish my very own business of architectural design firm
lender.occupational_info: Helping anyone to make their vision of a home come to live according to their expectance and personal budget.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I care about people throughout the world, have traveled to more than 100 countries and seen the struggle for survival, worldover.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their emotional and family problems.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I am very excited about being able to directly help someone.

lender.loan_because: we understand how important it can be to receive a helping hand.

lender.name: Generoso
lender.loan_because: we can all make a difference.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I think it is such a great website... I love watching how far 25 dollars can go for people in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I believe in the good in every person and that we can all help others live better lives.

lender.name: Ben and Meg
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending creates grass roots economic changes that create sustainable change in communities and is a great way to have a direct line to the people to whom you wish to give. While micro-lending does not provide financial returns, it provides social returns within the communities, which in today's world is infinitely more important than financial returns.

lender.name: Africa Matters
lender.loan_because: Africa Matters loans because we love the fact that micro finance loans are able to help numerous entrepreneurs in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Africa Matters is an organization that aims to raise awareness among the Lakehead University community about issues in Africa. We also intend to fundraise so that we can help support initiatives to improve the quality of life in Africa. Areas of focus are: ‚Ä¢ Health and the AIDS epidemic ‚Ä¢ Education ‚Ä¢ Women‚Äôs Issues ‚Ä¢ Poverty ‚Ä¢ Development

lender.name: Arian
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an archivist. Preserving records for future generations.

lender.name: Ervin
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Coordination and execution of International Military Training with U.S. Armed Forces.

lender.name: Benji
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help a person, group, or family in a big way simply by taking a little time out of the day and showing you care. Even if it's a small amount being lent, it makes a big impact on those receiving the micro loan and also helps open our eyes to the troubles and poverty going on in the world we all live in and share together.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Bachelor of Science degree in Political Science from Northern Illinois University and have been involved in such organizations as the American Cancer Society, World Wildlife Fund, Invisible Children, and Amnesty International.

lender.name: JohnKnee
lender.loan_because: I believe people deserve a lending hand when in need. In turn, they will do the same for others (Pay It Forward).

lender.name: Genny
lender.loan_because: This makes me smile

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I'm good guy Allan

lender.name: MamaB
lender.occupation: Devoted to becomming a better human being
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good! As a mum to 5 beautiful people, its really important to me to teach them by example how we need to help each other in life and through Kiva we have a fantastic opportunity to do just that. It is especially inspiring to help people who are striving for better not through charity but by being given access to a loan that they will pay back with dignity and pride. Its what I would hope for should I have found myself in that position.
lender.occupational_info: Its constantly under review!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see my daughter grow up in a better world. And as the saying goes: "if opportunity doesn't knock, build a door." Or in this case help build a door.

lender.loan_because: the best way to make a better planet
lender.occupational_info: easy

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to be able to make a difference, however large or small, as well as to give opportunities to others, which I sometimes take for granted myself.

lender.name: David W.
lender.loan_because: Charity requires action. The old adage give a man a fish and you've fed him for a day; Teach him to fish and you've fed him for a lifetime. This is my way of teaching others to fish. A Christian principle.

lender.name: Craig & Jillian
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with resources we can share
lender.occupational_info: Jillian is a secondry school Music Teacher and Craig is an ICT Project Manager

lender.loan_because: I realise I was born in 'the right place', and my life is very easy compared to that of many others.
lender.occupational_info: As a translator I am translating all sorts of documents and articles, it is Interesting and divers; I learn something new every day

lender.loan_because: Global karma is a powerful thing.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make web sites and computer programs user friendly.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupation: Low Income Tax Credit Housing Manager
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. I am very thankful for the roof over my head, the fact that I have employment, and a support system of family and friends. Having said that, I am also very aware that there are people all over the world that do not have those things and if I can give them aid in any form, I want to do so.
lender.occupational_info: The company that I work for provides housing to low income tax credit families from Pennsylvania down to Georgia. While I love working in this field, my goal is to one day work with those at a poverty level and provide housing assistance to those individuals.

lender.name: 6th Hour Sociology
lender.loan_because: we like helping people

lender.name: Roni
lender.loan_because: I need it for my bussines. I'm work with 3 of member in Bangbarung Galeri arts and decorations. In our home land, we just can make product depend to customer order. lender.name: Kathrine
lender.loan_because: I want women to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I sit inside a small office without much contact with other people and take information that is old and on paper and scan it into the computer to make the information more readily available to people in my company.

lender.name: Shawn

lender.occupational_info:
I work for an alternative school on a Native Reserve in Canada ( Tyendinaga Mohawk Territory ). I look after all the buildings maintenance and also the computer tech.
Also with my own store at home, Rez-Mart we sell Native crafts & convenience store stuff & tobacco products.

lender.occupational_info: Help companies achieve their best performance!

lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.

lender.name: Ms. Gomez
lender.loan_because: I have always believed in helping people, especially the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade bilingual students.

lender.name: deb
lender.loan_because: My kids and I believe in helping others. My kids take great pleasure in being a big part of making the the world a better place.

lender.name: Chris Wingert
lender.loan_because: "He who oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, but whoever is kind to the needy honors God." Proverbs 14:31
lender.occupational_info: Professional Soccer Player

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students the basics of starting and operating a business. I specialize in the training and treatment of employees.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because:
I've traveled to Southeast Asia - I fell in love Cambodian culture, and Vietnamese food.
I want to make the world a better place - and lending through Kiva lets me feel that one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a cook / chef at a restaurant.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. ~ Winston Churchill

lender.name: Ericka
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world, even if it is just a little bit at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Iowa. I am studying International Studies and German and I hope to go on to get my Global Studies Masters in Freiburg, Germany.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to start a business and keep it going.
lender.occupational_info: International Investment, Day trading, Sales, and Advertising.

lender.name: Dusty
lender.loan_because: Feels good to be doing some good worldwide. In memory of Dusty, my big Maine Coon cat who died 2006
lender.occupational_info: I repair and upgrade gaming equipment.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner as well.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: everyone has an obligation to share their good fortune.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me abundantly and I am giving back a little of what He has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I guard my house. I chase away squirrels, stray cats, and the mailman.

lender.name: Edmond
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my own life. I want to be able to give the opportunity to someone to make a difference in their own life. I am pretty sure they have a greater need for the money than I do.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I must lift as I climb.
lender.occupational_info: In charge of Transit Informatics Research efforts.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Its a chance to share the wealth. As an entrepreneur myself I appreciate the help of someone to grow my business.
lender.occupational_info: I run a computer consulting company in Ottawa Canada. We specialize in helping government organizations access, organize, analyze and report on their data.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: home duties/ part time ofice work

lender.name: Gatot
lender.loan_because: I need some money about US$1000 to sponsorize for my work in the entertainment world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a owner of the company - it calls The Production, which have some idea and goal to start business in a content provider, like SMS engine, and work together with 5 big operator company in Indonesia.

lender.name: Doug / Meri
lender.loan_because: I need to 'PAY IT FORWARD'.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the construction industry. The company I work for is large with many projects under way at the same time. I help to keep projects efficient and profitable. My wife is a private tutor with many years of experience having homeschooled our children as well as many others.

lender.name: Anna Maria
lender.occupational_info: I help educate doctors on specific medications that are available to patients. I also help couples plan their weddings.

lender.name: La Schaap
lender.loan_because: It gives me great joy to help others to help themselves. Watching a gift given to me by my uncle a few years ago give time and time again. Truly a gift that keeps on giving! It makes me smile each time I make a loan too... it just feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Full time Mother and Organic Farmer. Staff at our Local Community Food Co-Op in the Flying C'.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I think loaning money to help another person work their way out of poverty is wonderful and empowering.

lender.name: Al
lender.loan_because: I've seen through Habitat For Humanity that a hand-up is better than a hand-out. Moreove, if people have the initiative to improve their condition in life; it's rewarding to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from teaching woodworking and building construction courses to hight school students and now keep active remodelling houses, building custom cabinets, machining decorative moldings for historic buildings and making custom furniture. I reciently returned from a construction mission trip to Guatemala and am considering similar mission trips. I am also activel involved with fundraising for a Cancer Foundation.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel warm & fuzzy inside.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I am doing well and want to help others.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: I care and I can

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: As a wise men tough me once: "Life on earth in not free... You are obliged to create value and pass on part of the blessings received"

lender.name: Liek
lender.loan_because: We're very fortunate to have been born in a wealthy country. We want to support those people who are less fortunate than us.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful that God provided me with more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: Booking concerts for musicians and bands; helping songswriter to sell songs to other artists.

lender.name: Lucky
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have achieved in life, and wish to help others to come closer their dreams and wishes.

lender.name: Willem
lender.loan_because: i believe in microcredit over 20 years, so now i can actually get involved and walk the talk :)
lender.occupational_info: Working at an african phonecompany ( Celtel). Besides that, i am a photographer.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me over the years with so many financial opportunities to better my economic status. I want to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the PR department of the state university. I'm basically the office manager. My duties include basic secretarial work along with some event planning.

lender.name: Franco & Maria
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers me the opportunity to have a positive impact in specific peoples lives, help entrepreneurs expand their businesses and allow people to be indipendent.
lender.occupational_info: My wife & I each have a degree in Clinical Biology. Besides having worked sporadically in several clinical labs, we have currently focused our job interests toward Food Safety & Quality Assurance.

lender.name: ADEMOLA
lender.loan_because: because i would like to finance goods and in order to make more proft and invest more in my bi
lender.occupational_info: buildinding materials

lender.name: Sylvia & Nina
lender.occupation: Retired Biology Professor / Higher Ed Data Analyst
lender.loan_because: My grandma (Sylvia) taught me that we had a responsibility towards the other people on this earth. I taught her how to use the internet to help people we could never meet. Her task was a bit larger than mine.
lender.occupational_info: Grandma taught biology for many years, mainly to nursing students. I work for a large university and help them gather and manage information about their employees.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because:
I am a student, so I know how important it can sometimes be to borrow money to improve your future!
I love that Kiva is based on the knowledge of local financial experts and entrepreneurs about their economy, rather than asking local people to rely on foreign "experts" to tell them how to fix things.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student from Canada studying in the USA for my doctorate in archaeology.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to spread opportunity and inspiration
lender.occupational_info: I live in London in the UK, I work on new web projects and run Antigone, a charitable trust.

lender.name: Padma
lender.loan_because: There is a need.

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: If I can help with small loans through this organization to entrepreneurs round the world it will make both me and the entrepreneur happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, have been working in the computerbusiness. I have been living in several countries mostly Europe but also USA. Now resides in Sweden

lender.name: Deana & Matt
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a global impact. It's amazing to see people changing their lives for the better through microfinancing.
lender.occupational_info: Deana stays home with our two children and Matt's an Anesthesiologist.

lender.name: Rolly
lender.loan_because: to develope travel agent business
lender.occupational_info: I'm business as services agent, especially for hotel, airline ticketing, and car rental

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am interested in empowering people and facilitating equal access to financial resources.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a Program Officer for the Grameen Technology Center in Seattle,WA, part of the Grameen Foundation.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Those who have even a little more need to give to those who have a little less in this world...
lender.occupational_info: International media and marketing consultant, with a focus on, but not limited to, sports marketing, corporate sponsorship and consumer promotions

lender.name: Stacey
lender.occupation: Stay at home mom and Artist

lender.name: Levi and Kelli
lender.loan_because: We can't think of a better way to help people than to give them the opportunity to create and sustain their own business or livelihood.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: I want to see women all over the world become economically independent!
lender.occupational_info: I provide services to students with disabilities so that they can achieve their college education.

lender.name: Neiman
lender.loan_because: i believe everyone should be afforded the same opportunity, i have been blessed with, to create their own standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: Internet related devlopement

lender.name: Paolo
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I spend time, often in front of a computer, thinking about how to make a reasonable, maybe useful, use of technology.
